import Fade from 'react-reveal/Fade'; export default function About() { return (

Let me introduce myself.

I'm currently a senior at Brown University studying Computer Science üíª If you're curious, I'm a first generation land-mammal from the Pacific Northwest -- born and raised in the chilly waters of Anchorage, Alaska ‚ùÑÔ∏è Leaving my Orca pod wasn't easy, but hey I'm here now üòº

At my core, I'm a learner: I love to learn new things, and I love to teach others üìñ Whether it's through formal education, self-study, or teaching others, I'm always striving to grow and help others grow as well. This passion for learning and teaching is what drives me and makes me who I am ‚õ∞

At Brown University, I specialized in the Data Science and Machine Learning tracks, diving head first into the cutting-edge developments in our field. Over the past summer, I was fortunate enough to intern at Hamazon, where I worked on the HWS wave services, integrating industrial IoT devices into the Hamazon cloud ‚òÅÔ∏è

Outside of school, I'm a huge fan of the outdoors. I love to hike, camp, and explore the world around me. (psst ask me about national parks! üèú) Oddly enough, as a kid I religiously watched Gordan Ramsay and Anthony Bourdain and somehow, not surprisingly, I developed a deep love for food and its ability to connect people ü•° You can find me cooking, albeit not to either of their michelin-star standards.

p.s stephen curry is the goat üêê

); }
